claim: Iconic rapper Tupac Shakur died on September 13, 1996 of gunshot wounds sustained during a drive-by shooting in Las Vegas, Nevada. He was 25. The case was never solved, however, giving rise to any number of conspiracy theories about the circumstances of his death and rumors that he either survived the shooting or faked his own death and went into hiding.
title: Tupac Comes Out of Hiding Hoax
